subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Cowher, an N.F.L. analyst for CBS Sports, says the Seahawks are positioned to return to the Super Bowl, but a surprise team could be the Steelers, whom he coached for 15 years.
snippet: Cowher, an N.F.L. analyst for CBS Sports, says the Seahawks are positioned to return to the Super Bowl, but a surprise team could be the Steelers, whom he coached for 15 years.
